channel.title: 2 errors
channel.description:
Ok well on my source (delta) i have 2 problems:
First, when I log off my helm dissappears and then when i log on its gone.
Second, My d claw spec is glitched, whenever i use it dcs on client and i reconnect in a sec..
plz help, THANKs

item.title: 2 errors
item.dc:creator: @guitar9000 guitar9000
item.description:
@guitar9000 wrote:

I belive, one second let me look at the special code.:if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9000 && specialAmount > 49){
//AttackingOn2.specGFX(341);
specialAmount -= 50;
int h1d = misc.random(25);
//hitDiff = h1d+h1d/2+h1d/3+h1d/4;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(h1d);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(h1d/2);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(h1d/3);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].dealDamage(h1d/4);
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis();
setAnimation(1833);
specGFX(77);
actionInterval = getbattleTimer();
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
specOn = false;
sM("Your hits: " + h1d + ", " + h1d/2 + ", " + h1d/3 + ", " + h1d/4);
}

and im using my own client, ive added the model and all

Read full topic
